Posts.Content: Jul 29, 2011 08:17PM moyarscs wrote: I hated my JP but I used safety pins to pin my to my clothes and I took my husband in the shower to hold my drians.  I had my in for 3 weeks. they do make shirts now to hold the drains too.  I can tell you it does not matter how well you keep them clean I still got staph infection in the one.  if you feel any problems do not delay in going to the dr.   Staph infection comes on very fast
Posts.Title: JP drains DeeLJ DocBabs

Posts.Content: Feb 17, 2011 11:37PM moyarscs wrote: I do not know if any one cares what I think but I guess I do not hold out for a cure, but with that being said I do hope that they can find a vaccine that could help with BC.  You see I am one of the lucky ones who are BRCA2 gene and I have two daughters (9 & 11) I gave them a 50% chance of giving them this gene and maybe BC so I hope that this is not something I as a mother have gave my babies to destroy their lives.  I have done everything I can do be here to see both the girls walk down the aisle and to bring me grandbabies one day.  As I type this it is like the first time I have been saying these things so I am weeping as I type.  So to go back to the question I do not feel a cure is coming since there is not one of our cancer really alike but a vaccines would be great.   I plan to be around a long time and I plan on being the most informed mother can be to help her babies make the best possible choices when it comes to their options for BC.  so please do not lose site in that fact that we need to help our next generations be educated in breast cancer and their choices. Sorry for a young mother who has a great husband who has lived every second of this monster to make sure he understood also.  I love my whole family and when we talk  we say "when we had cancer"  since it is a family diesce
Posts.Title: Do you have HOPE or CONFIDENCE in a cure? BaseballFan sandilee

Posts.Content: Mar 10, 2012 01:15PM moyarscs wrote: Penny I know the feeling you are having I am laying here waiting for my pain meds to kick in so I can get some rest. I word of advise is stay comfortable, if it means a whole pill or two take them. I have been on pain meds since my journey began and I do not see anytime soon of coming off.
